tool_description: The industry leading API for crypto trading, real-time data collection, and exchange account management.
name: The Shrimpy Universal Crypto Exchange Interface
title: The Shrimpy Universal Crypto Exchange Interface
tool_name: The Shrimpy Universal Crypto Exchange Interface

api_list.name: Get Ticker
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all Shrimpy supported exchange assets for a particular exchange along with pricing information. The pricing information is updated once per minute.

required_parameters.name: exchange
required_parameters.description: The exchange for which you are collecting data

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-shrimpy-universal-crypto-exchange-interface.p.rapidapi.comhttps://dev-api.shrimpy.io/v1/exchanges/kucoin/ticker"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-shrimpy-universal-crypto-exchange-interface.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-shrimpy-universal-crypto-exchange-interface.p.rapidapi.comhttps://dev-api.shrimpy.io/v1/exchanges/{exchange}/ticker"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-shrimpy-universal-crypto-exchange-interface.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
